overview:
visual-to-code: 3 tools; ensure_delegation_ready -> Ensure parent monitoring system is running and ready (WARMUP TOOL).

    Use proactively before generation tasks to verify parent agent monitoring
    is active., generate_code_from_image -> Generate HTML/Tailwind code from design image via parent agent delegation (NO API COSTS).

    This tool delegates to the parent Claude Code agent to process the image using
    YOUR session's vision capability., generate_variants -> Generate multiple code variants via parent agent delegation (NO API COSTS).

    Creates 2-6 variants with different temperatures (0.7-1.0+) by delegating each
    to the parent Claude Code agent.
